generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and some vegetation, and it appears to be used by pedestrians.
- building: A large modern building with glass windows and a structured facade is prominently visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees with green foliage lining the road and surrounding the sidewalk, as well as some shrubs near the building.
- terrain: Grass and other low-lying vegetation are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalk, particularly on the left side near the train tracks.
- sky: The sky is visible in the upper portion of the image, appearing partly cloudy with some patches of blue.
- person: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider, as they are operating a bicycle.
- car: A car is visible in the distance on the road, further down the road, appearing as a dark-colored vehicle.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including traffic light poles and sign poles, located along the road and sidewalk.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging above the road, with its signal facing the direction of the camera.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a blue background and a red border, indicating a no-entry or no-parking zone, is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
